### Reviewer Checklist (Do Not Edit)

**Orchestrator Review (Stage 1 - Technical):**
- [ ] Commit format valid (`[Agent] TICKET-ID - description`)
- [ ] Branch naming correct (`<agent>/<ticket-id>/<description>`)

- [ ] No locked file violations
- [ ] PR template sections complete

- [ ] Code quality acceptable
- [ ] Architecture appropriate
- [ ] Tests adequate
- [ ] Ready to merge
